summary: Improve deadlock detection by interrupting deadlocked workflows post-eviction and providing the deadlocked thread's stack trace instead of the raise point stack trace.
userImpact: Users will get better diagnostics when workflows deadlock, making it easier to debug and resolve deadlock issues.
proposedFix: Interrupt the workflow if evicted post-deadlock and include the deadlocked thread's stack trace in the deadlock error.
keyQuote: Try to interrupt the workflow if it is evicted post-deadlock and try to put the stack trace of the deadlocked thread as the deadlock error's stack trace.
